name: Happy Face 2 !
description:
A simple to  view game where you will have to avoid all the ''Mad Face'' and spikes ! Try to collect all stars for unlock the next level and save your friends ! Total of 28 levels + 4  Boss to defeat !

You can submit your best Death score on the Leaderboard at the end of the game!

Play with W/S/A/D or arrow + mouse in the menu

Credit: Music by: Ecreet music

                  All sound can be found on : FreeSound
